mapper.select: SELECT * FROM vika_api_usage ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM vika_api_usage WHERE id > #{id} AND created_at > #{createdAt} LIMIT 1
SELECT id FROM vika_api_usage WHERE DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{statisticsTime} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id FROM vika_api_usage WHERE DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m') = #{statisticsTime} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT vau.id AS min_id, DATE_FORMAT(vau.created_at, '%Y-%m') AS month_time FROM vika_api_usage vau ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(vau.created_at, '%Y-%m') AS statistics_time, vau.space_id, COUNT(*) AS total_count, IFNULL(SUM(JSON_EXTRACT(vau.res_detail, '$.code') = 200), 0) AS success_count FROM vika_api_usage vau WHERE vau.id >= #{beginId} AND vau.id < #{endId} GROUP BY vau.space_id, statistics_time ORDER BY statistics_time
SELECT * FROM vika_api_statistics_daily ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM vika_api_statistics_monthly ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
